title: "XPO Logistics begins piloting DTNA’s eCascadia"
excerpt: "XPO Logistics (XPO) has partnered with Daimler Trucks North America (DTNA) to test Daimler’s battery-electric commercial trucks under real-life operating conditions in California. The fleet and market-leading truck maker have a decade-long history of innovation in the transportation space."
